text: The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend is a 1949 American romantic western comedy movie directed by Preston Sturges and was based on the story by Earl Felton. It stars Betty Grable, Cesar Romero, Rudy Vallee, Sterling Holloway, Hugh Herbert, El Brendel and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 romantic comedy movies Category:1940s Western (genre) movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend
